name: CompleteShipFromStoreTask
description:
Completes the ShipFromOrder task, indicating that the shipment of the order has taken place.

The order will be shipped and the shop stock will be moved to Transit.

properties.name: FinalShipment
properties.description: Optional for subtype Ship, requesting to cancel all that was not shipped (also see `UnpickedLinesReasonID`)

properties.name: ShouldBePrinting
properties.description: If you want to override printing behavior - will default to the `ShouldBePrinting` value from `StartShipFromStoreTask`

properties.name: StationID
properties.description: Required for subtypes Pick and Ship

properties.name: UnpickedLinesReasonID
properties.description: The reason why not all lines might be picked
